biotools.summary: CellCoal simulates the somatic evolution of single-cells. CellCoal generates a coalescent genealogy for a sample of somatic cells - no recombination - obtained from a growing population, together with a another cell as outgroup, introduces mutations along this genealogy, and produces single-cell diploid genotypes (single-nuclotide variants or SNVs).

bioschemas.name: CellCoal
